website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind henna-looking tattoos without the henna paste, chances are you will love the looks of these press-on/peel-off temporary tattoo stickers.
pros: These temporary henna tattoos feature sticker-like application that is less messy than applying henna paste, yet they look authentic when applied correctly
Kit comes with 6 sheets of tattoos – over 75 attractive designs total
Metallic finish looks nice on any skin tone
cons: There's a learning curve to applying them perfectly, and they tend to peel/wash off before you are ready to remove them

customer_reviews.title: I got so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I wore many of these to a wedding and got a ton of compliments. They looked great on my skin. I recommended them to everyone who complimented me!
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: Look Great Like Everyone Else!
customer_reviews.text: If you wanna wear these to a music festival like every other stereotypical basic girl, then buy these! Because that's exactly what I bought them for ;) You won't be unique, but dang do those metallics look good on your skin! Easy to apply. Stayed on for several days. The only ones that came off easily were the ones on the ends of my pointer and middle finger (which was to be expected). Smells bad directly out of packaging but that smell doesn't transfer to skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Arruda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice tattoos, I've got what I was expected. Easy to put on, looks not cheap , lasts for a few days ( I was swimming with it and taking shower).The only thing - it smells like a plastic or something when you open it))
customer_reviews.author: Kateryna

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: The designs are beautiful, however upon opening the package there was an incredibly toxic / chemical smell leaking from the paper sheets with the tattoos, strong enough to not dare put it on my skin, which is our bodies’ largest organ and absorbs toxins. I’ve ordered other temp tattoos on Amazon but none that smelled this strongly. I’d highly advise finding other brands if you care about your health.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nishimura Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: These tatoos are so cute. We use them for a rave and they held up all night and came off easily in the shower. All you have to do is cut around your design and use a dampened spount or paper towela nd place. The gold really pops out dark/tan skin. These are also perfect for bid day (if you are in sorority) or going to the beach or party and wanting to add a little something extra. Highly recommend. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: KianaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tattoos but the smell was gross
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if all the tattoos smelled as bad as mine did, but I read the reviews and couldn't find anything posted. They smelled so strong, I wiped them off (which was NOT easy) and didn't use them with my costume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Easy to apply. This is my second time purchasing them.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It comes with a lot of beautiful tattoos to choose from. I used these last summer for fun and festivals. I can’t wait to do it again this year! I wish the arm tattoos made it completely around, but it’s maybe half. Doesn’t show that well with the model holding her arms up in the photo. Otherwise, they stick on fine. Just be careful around any oil or lotion. It will take it right off!
customer_reviews.author: P3ach

customer_reviews.title: Shiny happiness in a box
customer_reviews.text: First off, I had surgery the day before prime day. So I get on Amazon on prime day and what do I see, but these. They were so damn shiny...soooooo shiny (my precious ..). I wasn’t thinking entirely clearly due to pain meds, nerve meds, and muscle relaxers. On top of it all, my dog was being especially twat tastic as she wouldn’t leave the cat alone as I TRIED to relax on the couch. In despair, I cruised through deals looking for wedding and Christmas ideas and somehow stumbled onto these... do I regret it, no. Do I need them, no. That’s ok though. The shinies will be my happiness as I’m confined to my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jani Michielsen

customer_reviews.title: ... in a timely fashion and it was simple and easy to put it on
customer_reviews.text: Received it in a timely fashion and it was simple and easy to put it on. However, even though i was very gentle when washing arms and forehead, it started to come off on the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Acsa

customer_reviews.title: Temporary that lasts
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these extremely adorable, they last! I got these for my boss who was going to Coachella. She put these on the day she left (Thursday) and when she came back on the following Wednesday, they were still on! They lasted through 100+ degree weather, dancing, sweating, and showering! I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Grondy

customer_reviews.title: Strong Plastic Smell
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love them, but their plastic smell was overwhelming and their texture gummy. The designs are lovely but they’re definitely not the quality I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: patapower

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not enough length
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, but did not have any tattoos that were long enough to go around my arm (I am not overweight). I had to do my best to put two together to cover the circumference. Easy to remove with oil-based makeup remover, and easy to apply. After a few hours they started to peel/flake off.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Julee

customer_reviews.title: Pass!
customer_reviews.text: Nightmare to apply! So aggravating when they kept sticking to the paper then when you finally get a part of it to stick to the skin you try and tap it and the whole thing sticks to your finger and curls up into an unusable mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been considering getting a tattoo, but have been unsure of the placement of where exactly I wanted it. So, I bought these temporary tattoos. They are so much fun! I get a lot of compliments on them, and switch them around all the time, they are especially flattering in the summertime when the sun really shows them off. I may end up not getting a permanent tattoo because these are so much fun to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Hatten

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing! And all have nice shapes
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! And all have nice shapes! All are pretty. They last like 2 days in good shape even if you shower but don't scratch them, to remove just scratch a little bit and with soap. They are very easy to use, the instructions are on the package, just cut the one you want, REMOVE THE TRANSPARENT PLASTIC FILM (because I forgot and ruined a couple :'( ), then apply to DRY skin, then cover with a very damp towel and press like for 2 mins or until is attached to you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for a 3 day LARP event- they lastest the whole weekend even lasting through showers, were easy to apply, came off with some olive oil and the best part.. people couldn't stop raving about them. Seriously, I received so many compliments on them it was unbelievable! They are absolutely gorgeous and shine in the sunlight. I'll be buying more :)
customer_reviews.author: Bayley

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used jewelry tattoos before but wanted different designs than my usual brand. These were just okay. They come off a Much Too Easily. My old brand would take about 2 days, even while showering. This brand has a clear film that transfers with the gold or silver design and it just doesn’t look as great, although I liked the designs. I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 3 day music festival that I went to with my friends. They are so beautiful, and they lasted the whole day and into the next. We had tons of compliments on them! Easy to apply, do not rub off easily, and do not fade or peel when you are dancing and sweaty! Seriously amazing product. Will be buying them again for next year's festivals!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun and shiny!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, girls fun pool day tattoos. Bridal parties. Just like any other press on with a damp cloth tattoo, they may not go on perfect without patience. Just scrub off with soap and water while in the shower. May take a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: Jencie E

customer_reviews.title: Worth it -
customer_reviews.text: These temporary tattoos were beautiful, I received a ton of compliments on them. They were easy to use, easy to remove and looked fabulous. Lotions and soaps didn’t leave sticky residue on the product as I have experienced this issue with similar products from other vendors. I used the same tattoo for 3 days and it still looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Shabrina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: These tattoos are perfect! I love it when items are so easy to use, last and are worth the price. Tried two on and can’t wait to use for my costume this weekend. Literally takes 30 seconds to apply 10 seconds to peel abs lasts until you scrub it off to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Ramentol

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: The quality is so bad. They do not last at all, and I followed the directions, applied it as instructed, however, they do not stick to the skin. Even after the full 30 -50 seconds, they will not stick and you will have to use your hands to press them down as you remove the paper. They come off and look really light in a couple of hours. They are so light on the skin that you can hardly see the design especially since they don't stick so easily to begin with. I am returning mine. I ordered actually henna tattoos from another brand and those are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: As pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tattoos! The designs are always as pictured and they hold up pretty well. On the downside, i found out that if you spray sunblock OVER the tattoo it will make the tattoo gummy and it will rub off asap. That was a bit of an issue for me at festival. I'm not sure there are ones available that can withstand sunblock, so i don't really count it as a negative.
customer_reviews.author: Mendocino King

customer_reviews.title: Multi-age wonderful
customer_reviews.text: All ages of girls love this. I shared these with my pre-teen nieces over the summer as well as my mom, aunt, cousins, and sisters. It was fun to let them pick out various ones and then enjoy the shimmer.
customer_reviews.author: HuckPie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but doesn't stick easily
customer_reviews.text: Always loved henna tattoos and this is my first time trying out this product. I'm having a difficult time getting the tattoo to stick. Some with stick on and the rest goes back with the paper. I've tried using more water, less water, 30 seconds like recommended and 1 minute. I realize the longer I hold it, the better it will come out. My daughter loves them. She's 2 and doesn't realize the flower is cut in half 😂
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Temporary Gold Leaf Tattoos
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have used them since 2014 during the summertime (pool side) and they last for quite some time. I do not have to change them but every 2 weeks. They remove with soap and water and wash cloth or rubbing alcohol. I receive many compliments on how pretty/neat/cool they are. I use mine on the outside vertical life of my ankle bone to hide a scar from surgery. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Michelle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 day festival!
customer_reviews.text: These tattoos are great! They lasted for 3 days of a festival even after showering. We learned to use soap and a washcloth to actually remove them before work again, but really surprised by the longevity. They do have a weird "old" smell even after applying, but not that big of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Bertelson

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These tattoos looked just how I wanted them to when I got them. They looked great; all my friends thought so too. I saw a lot of reviews complain about the smell. It was really faint and not that bad; I wouldn't worry about it. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because they only lasted perfectly for a max of 2 hours. My friends and I were sweating pretty badly so it's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to costume
customer_reviews.text: got these for mardi gras and applied them to my face and arms. lasted long enough for me and we sweat in new orleans. i didn’t have any problem removing them. i slather then in coconut oil. I’d definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Terra tats! They come in a variety of patterns, so I am not limited to one style! Options of gold and silver tatts is also a plus. I can see my creative juices flowing as Im excited from receiving multiple sheets of fashionable Terra Tatts 😍#ClassyBikerGang 😉 #*!#*! Pic attached is the lovely result 😍 I wore Terra's tatts on chest, hand & biceps #MustHaveAccessory
customer_reviews.author: *Rocstarr*

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly beautiful
customer_reviews.text: When I receive these tattoos I was a little worried that they were going to look cheap. But I needed them for Halloween and wasn’t going to stress over it. When I got them on I was pleasantly surprised. Yes, they definitely had a heavy chemical smell when you open the package... I set them out for a day or two and it got better and, once I applied them, the smell went away completely. They lasted a good 3 to 4 days on me, however I was careful not to scrub them off. The attached picture was taken on day 4. They are super glittery and very pretty on...I got constant compliments on them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these tattoos for my best friend's Bachelorette party and they were a huge hit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tattoos for my best friend's Bachelorette party and they were a huge hit. They were easy to apply and the metallic color holds true. I had several of the attendees asking where I purchased them once they found out that they didn't rub off easily and could stand up against getting wet. I'm just happy that I have some left over so I could take them home. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great durable tattoos
customer_reviews.text: These tattoos are great! Make sure your skin is dry prior to use (you will get a tan Of the outline if you are fair skinned). Using baby oil to remove is super key
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Did not recieve the number of tattoos advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I got a closed package of tattoos. I opened them to find only 5 sheets instead of 6. When I counted, I had 48 tattoos instead of 75. Now I have to buy more. I'm really unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: carol barton

customer_reviews.title: So easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: These designs are beautiful. I used them for a 4day festival and they lasted 2-4days depending on where I stuck them. They were a little tacky, but I was in the hot sun most of the day sweating too.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and cute looking
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a themed birthday party. They look great and arrived quickly but I didn’t try them out because I realized I’m too old to attend themed birthday parties.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Banks

customer_reviews.title: Very unique
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife to wear at the pool in Vegas. I was shocked at how many compliments she received. In 3 days at least 30 people either complimented her or asked where she got them. She was able to put most of them on. I helped with a few on her back.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, concerning odor
customer_reviews.text: These tattoos transfer well, are metallic as pictured, and stay on for 2-3 days (if you want to take it off sooner, use an oil to easily remove). The only thing I don't like about them is that they have a strong chemical smell that I can still detect after storing them in the open air for over a month. So as pretty as these tattoos are, I worry about what is in them that is causing this odor. For me, it is not a big enough deal to deter me from using these occasionally for dance performances but I would not want them on my skin every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarie

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I used one on my forehead. It looked really cool, but it was a hot day and it came off after a few hours. I used a couple of smaller ones on my fingernails. I put on nail polish and put a clear topcoat on top. They look really nice and have lasted 4 days so far.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine Pizzarello

customer_reviews.title: Looks like real gold and silver foil
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good quality and good shiny gold and silver foils. You have to really apply well to get small air bubbles out that may occur as the lift off paper backing.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love, highly recommend. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. A lot of sheets for the money. My friend and I loved using these multiple times for raves. They stay on very well for the night, and wipe right off with olive oil when you don’t need them anymore. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: These were good tattoos. I wore them to a music festival in 90 degree heat, meaning lots of sweat, and they stayed on pretty good. They did not do well in creased areas like the upper forearm but all in all good!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Frilot

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and chic.
customer_reviews.text: Great variety, these look pretty, neat and beautiful when applied. I was worried the gold might be tacky but it isn't. My wrists are quite tiny so I have a bit of difficulty getting them to fit, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were so much fun! I bought them to take on a beach vacation and I wore them daily. Depending on my activity, they lasted from 1-3 days. However, it didn't matter because they were inexpensive and easy.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a festival. When trying to apply to the skin, no matter how long you held it on, a lot of the tattoo still came off on the paper. The ones we did get to apply, did not last long in the sun. They started fading and peeling off. Once we tried to take them off the next day, I had to SCRUB at my skin to the point it hurt. Would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Madison K.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was running late to my event and at the last minute remembered I got these. It was easy to put on. Got compliments on it. Went very well with my dress and you get so many.
customer_reviews.author: Korene Davis

customer_reviews.title: Bright, durable, and beautiful accents
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Terra Tattoos. They’re the most durable and shiniest I’ve found. These tattoos have fun and interesting designs, which shine through adversity. I normally use them at music festivals and some even stay on all three days. Length of use depends on where you put them, how much you sweat, and how intensely you scrub in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Lela

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best temporary tattoos ever!! They stay on for at least a week without cracking/chipping/peeling off! They will come off sooner if you are wearing sunscreen. But overall, these are amazing and super cute for festivals or just for summertime! Very high quality, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, come off with 2-4 washes.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the fact that it is not on as long as traditional henna.Very Pretty - the only issue I had, was I put much of the Henna on my hands, and it does wash off fairly easily (2-4 washes and they were gone). Very similar to kids stick on tattoos.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Wright

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Every one I put on came off the next day and was sticky. I don't recommend this brand. Returned product
customer_reviews.author: GarbloJones

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smelling applicators
customer_reviews.text: They REEK OF petroleum.. I thought it was just the plastic in which it came in, so I still out them on, but almost immediately took it off because my arm smelled like it too..DO NOT BUY..
customer_reviews.author: Mar Lene

customer_reviews.title: Chemical fumes!
customer_reviews.text: Too bad. These are really pretty, but the chemical odor is incredibly strong and extremely unpleasant. Yikes! If I go out wearing one of these, people will think that I soaked myself in formaldehyde.
customer_reviews.author: JHC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a girl empowerment event I have every year, we had a tattoo/makeup station. The girls went bananas over these (some of the adults too!). I was extremely pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: They don’t stay on for long....
customer_reviews.text: I used these for Lollapalooza and they did not hold up. They looked very nice and were easy to apply but after a while they scrunched up in some parts of the design. They do come off rather easy but some part were difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY DUMB
customer_reviews.text: these are NOT HENNA. the glitter makes them uncomfortable, and mine started chipping off overnight. Way more metallic than they look, so you can't even see the designs. just look like somebody smeared some glitter glue on you, and feel that wat too.... would be cute designs & sizes, especially for small hands and arms, if they were just white & made out of all natural henna. these are not good for your skin & look dumb.
customer_reviews.author: mollyann

customer_reviews.title: Fun with G.MoM
customer_reviews.text: This is really fun to do with your G. Kiddos... Easy to apply and long enough lasting..
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ellis

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved these. Imagine an 8 yo running around covered with gold tattoos.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and shiny. This is a great alternative for henna On holidays. It easily comes off with the some baby oil. It has a chrome finish which catches everyone’s eyes. So happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Alwysbehappyandhealthy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but rubs off quick good for a day or two
customer_reviews.author: Adedoyin

customer_reviews.title: Love these tattoos
customer_reviews.text: We've bought this brand a couple of times, and we love them! Super easy to use and last a long time. Haven't had one fail to adhere yet. We'll buy more when they run out again.
customer_reviews.author: kassichi88

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved these! It came pretty quick
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these! It came pretty quick , and I was able to use some for a big festival I was attending to! I still have a lot left! Shared w/ a couple of friends and they loved it as well !!!!! Def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Indigo.chi

customer_reviews.title: Metallic Tattoos
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! Perfect for a costume. Easy to apply. Just like the kids tattoos you have to put water over the paper backing and hold. Just make sure you peel off the plastic sheeting on the other side....
customer_reviews.author: Janeen H.

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely pleased with my purchase there give you an option of gold and silver super love they are water proof also.. a must order I get a lot of complements!!!
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit at 2 different parties I had! Kids and adults loved them equally! So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Shanam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party favor for pre-teens
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and suitable for all ages for special occasions. A big hit as a party favor for pre-teen party.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, shiny, very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Great tattoos! I bought them last year for a festival and I am pleased again. They come with a great variety and are easy to remove. They’re beautiful and apply easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina M Butner

customer_reviews.title: fun kit with great patterns
customer_reviews.text: this was a fun kit with a big group of girls from 3-13 and the moms too one saturday afternoon. pretty patterns, especially some of the bracelets that were even nice to keep on with my real jewelry for the next week. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lisa swift

customer_reviews.title: and were beautiful (I used them on my shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a weekend-long dance festival. They applied within seconds, dried fast, and were beautiful (I used them on my shoulders, hands, and face). So many people gave compliments and thought that I had painted them on. By the end of the weekend the ones on my hands were starting to come off, but considering that during the dances hundreds of people were touching my hands I was not surprised. The shoulder and face ones stayed put until I washed them off. Absolutely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: balance&swing44

customer_reviews.title: Great Tatts!
customer_reviews.text: Sexy, long lasting, fun! Be sure to apply to CLEAN skin! Lots of designs. My friend and I used a whole bunch and I still have a lot left. Easy to apply, lasted 3 days (even through a massage and spa day)
customer_reviews.author: ShoeGameProper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply for the most part
customer_reviews.text: These were great, I only have issues applying one of them which didn't seem to want to come off the paper. Would by again.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but don't last.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I would be able to wear the tattoo for at least a day but it would start to peel less than an hour after application every time. I applied it to other parts of my body and other people and we all had the same problem with it getting sticky shortly after application and rubbing off.
customer_reviews.author: Paula R

customer_reviews.title: Soooo easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Soooo easy to use. Reminds me of when I was a kid and I used to buy the bubble gum with the tattoos stickers lol...I was able to use mine for 2 days after that it wash off completely, but that’s expected...many different sheets of different designs to keep anyone entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa E.

customer_reviews.title: These worked well for a fun party and did not start to fall off after ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for a fun party and did not start to fall off after many hours of wear before they were purposefully removed. The tattoos are true to the photos and are shiny like metal as described.
customer_reviews.author: Augustus

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my daughters prom night, they are AWESOME. gorgeous! would buy again
customer_reviews.author: pumpkins4sale

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was amazing! Put it on for a wedding and got ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was amazing! Put it on for a wedding and got several complements!! However it only lasted two days. On day three it became sticky and it felt gross, so I removed it in the shower. But if you are thinking about wearing it for a special event this product works wonders
customer_reviews.author: MyTwoCents

customer_reviews.title: But they last for like 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely cute and vibrant gold. But they last for like 2 days ,3 tops. I'm better off just go getting a real henna tat. Very very cute tho and goes on in literally 5 seconds ☺. And a lot comes in the pack!!!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee

customer_reviews.title: FUN tattoos!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! Ordered for festival. keep ordering every month. Super easy to apply. Sadly - they peel off faster than some others. Easy to remove with oil / makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: RBL FSH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and as described. I absolutely loved the tattoos, especially all the options!! They looked fabulous with my outfit and I received many compliments:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, lasting
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a vacation. Everyone loved them and they stayed on for a while. Definitely ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: AdamB

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I placed these on my arms, shoulder and chest and the results was beautiful. They were very easy to use and added an extra WOW factor to my AfroPunk festival outfit. They handled an entire days worth of jumping and dancing in 85 degree heat. They shockingly didn't come off entirely until a day later. Very impressed and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, the transfer is inmediately and they last ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, the transfer is inmediately and they last a couple of days. They look amazing on the beach but will come off really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Galan

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, I had to try one on. Now I can’t wait for festival season!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: These are as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These temporary tattoos are great and exactly as advertised. I plan to distribute them at Burning Man.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bogard

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but they stay on for so long. Had to practically rip my skin off my arm to get it off, but they look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Issy Boegel

customer_reviews.title: Fun tattoos! Go on easy and look good
customer_reviews.text: Fun tattoos! Go on easy and look good. Really wish that they had a different set of designs because these are very affordable but the designs are kind of ugly
customer_reviews.author: arielle

customer_reviews.title: Used them for ezoo. The ones on my fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: Used them for ezoo. The ones on my fingers and hands came off within the hour from constantly rubbing against things. The one on my forehead and chest lasted all night. I was able to scrub everything off by the next day. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color and cute patterns
customer_reviews.text: Really nice patterns, vibrant. Don't last more than a day and starts coming off. I'm giving 4 stars because the cute patterns and color and there are a lot of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lorianza

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply. Wore to beach and received many many compliments. Tattoos did not come off in water. They did start to fade/peel with constant bodily contact. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given this more stars but the designs need to be longer. They wouldn’t fit around my arm etc.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer2013

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for the weekend!
customer_reviews.text: I come home on Friday after work and "tat" up for the weekend debauchery. Come Monday morning, I use coconut oil to rub off the tattoos in order to return to my respectable day job.
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Moir

customer_reviews.title: Will order again!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, just as great as the more marketed brand. If applied properly they will last a couple of days, but scrub right off of you need to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sub par
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to transfer, took at least 5 minutes to adhear incompletely. Mostly the design ripped. The foil was overly shiny and thin. Once on the glue was very tacky, I have been cleaning it for 10 minutes and still can't seem to get the glue off. I have used many foil tattoos before, these were sub par.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cabal

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty and stay on pretty well. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to SLOWLY remove the paper from ur skin after u have soaked it.
customer_reviews.text: I used that stick tattoos for an event where I was showing my body. They were easy to use but be sure to soak the paper and hold it dwn for awhile b4 SLOWLY removing the paper from ur skin. The metallic colors looked awesome on my dark skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ibn

customer_reviews.title: you'll stop traffic
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for my Halloween costume. So shiny, it caught everyone's attention. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Tattoo
customer_reviews.text: A little messy with the water but my female students weee head over heels and put them everywhere - big success for teaching Asian culture
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great henna tattoos
customer_reviews.text: Great metallic henna tattoos. Bought them for a Halloween costume but got lots of compliments when wearing in normal everyday setting.
customer_reviews.author: Mamarace

customer_reviews.title: Loving these tattoos
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I are having so much fun with these gorgeous tattoos! I apply cocoa butter to keep the mandala I put on my arm looking fresh. It's been 3 days and it still looks pretty good. im so glad I ordered! Was shipped and at my door in 2 days and there are so many tattoos to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tattoos!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter's Egyptian-themed 11th birthday party. She and all her guests loved them - the metallics were super shiny, and the designs were just what we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia D Burke

customer_reviews.title: Good temp tattoo
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay on long enough but they are temp so not bad. Great for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

product_meta.title: Terra Tattoos Temporary Henna Metallic Tattoos - Over 75 Mandala Tattoos (Gold)
feature_bullets: OVER 75+ New & stunning designs that match the vibrant images shown, perfect for Coachella festival! These shimmering metallic tattoos make great gift ideas for her and DIY presents!

PREMIUM QUALITY - Our metallic temporary tattoos will last several days and keep its flash & glitter look. Not to mention, they’re waterproof and come in gorgeous designs including flowers, mandalas, elephants, and more!
WATERPROOF & NON-TOXIC - These stylish fake jewelry tattoos are non-toxic, safe and can be worn anywhere on your body

QUICK & EASY TO APPLY - Up your look in less than 1 minute with this hot new trend. These stylish foil tattoos are easily removable by rubbing baby oil. Wear it as bracelets, arm bands, on your leg, back, shoulder, face, or even your hair!

HAPPY CUSTOMER GUARANTEE - We’re confident you’ll love the new bling, so your order is backed by our 30-day money back for any reason, guaranteed. Be sure to check out our other collections for more stunning designs.
